title: Mythicmobs禁止原版物品掉落
author: woyaoshiyong
txt_content: 如题，怎样才能让mythicmobs中生物掉落的物品不掉落原版物品，只掉落设置的。

replies.author: HotPe_e
replies.txt_content:
在怪物设置里
Options:
  PreventOtherDrops: false
改成 true
如果没有 那就加一串

replies.author: Vanicth
replies.txt_content: 然而并没有用 mm自带修改掉落本身物品坏了

replies.author: Vanicth
replies.txt_content: 推荐使用指令/gamerule doMobLoot false
